author: Lon.TV
description:
Buy one on Amazon: https://lon.tv/56jfx (compensated affiliate link) - Aurzen teamed up with Roku to make the first smart projector that has a Roku integrated. It's not as bright as I would like but it isn't bad for its price point. See more projectors: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIs3All-THNiaA2tuKmRp5ru and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s
